ccre.event

Interface EventSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Event

    public interface EventSource
    An event source. This produces events when it fires. A user can register listeners to be called when the EventSource fires. ccre.event.Event is a good implementation of this so that you don't have to write your own listener management code.
    See Also:
    Event

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addListener(EventConsumer listener)
      Register a listener for when this event is fired.
      void removeListener(EventConsumer listener)
      Remove a listener for when this event is fired.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        boolean addListener(EventConsumer listener)
        Register a listener for when this event is fired. Return false if the listener was already registered, or true if it wasn't.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add.
        Returns:
        whether or not it was actually added.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(EventConsumer listener)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Remove a listener for when this event is fired. If the specified listener wasn't registered, throw an IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the listener wasn't registered.
